BasicInfo.short: Realy is a mobile first real estate platform with a suite of apps and tools that empower real estate agents, companies and homebuyers.

Products.name: Personal Branded App- Powered by Realy
Products.description: Comprehensive personal branded apps for real estate agents, created by Realy in a few short steps. No technology or design skills required.

Products.name: Realy Safe
Products.description: One-touch emergency alert app created for enhanced real estate agent safety. Sends "Help" and "Safe" notifications instantly via email/text.

Products.name: White Label Apps- Powered by Realy
Products.description: Branded apps for real estate agencies and brokerages complete with agent profiles, detailed listings, automatic MLS synchronization and more

Products.name: Realy Safe for Apple Watch
Products.description: Enhances real estate safety with the innovative features of Realy Safe combined with the convenience of wearable technology by Apple Watch.

Products.name: Realy for Google Glass
Products.description: Browse over 1.2 million listings and agent profiles, beautifully displayed in Google Glass with calling features and detailed descriptions

Products.name: Realy for Apple Watch
Products.description: Browse over 1.2 million listings and thousands of agent profiles with the convenience and style of Apple Watch wearable technology.
